org.ardenus.language

Class Language

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.language.Language

  • public class Language
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for easily translating dialog that can be founded in language files. This class can also be used for selectively loading resources such as textures or music based on the language.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • getFallback

        public static Language getFallback()

        the language that will be used in the event the intended language could not be used.
